-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Schema usersdb
-- -----------------------------------------------------
CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS `usersdb` DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci ;
USE `usersdb` ;

-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `usersdb`.`userinfo`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `usersdb`.`userinfo` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `usersdb`.`userinfo` (
  `idusers` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `usernames` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `passwords` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `addresses` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `firstname` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `lastname` VARCHAR(45) NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `birthday` DATETIME NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idusers`),
  UNIQUE INDEX `username_UNIQUE` (`usernames` ASC) VISIBLE,
  UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`idusers` ASC) VISIBLE)
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 19
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `usersdb`.`emails`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `usersdb`.`emails` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `usersdb`.`emails` (
  `idemails` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `usernames` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `dates` MEDIUMTEXT NOT NULL,
  `subjects` MEDIUMTEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `body` LONGTEXT NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `sender` MEDIUMTEXT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idemails`),
  UNIQUE INDEX `id_UNIQUE` (`idemails` ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX `fk_usernames_idx` (`usernames` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_usernames`
    FOREIGN KEY (`usernames`)
    REFERENCES `usersdb`.`userinfo` (`usernames`)
    ON DELETE CASCADE
    ON UPDATE CASCADE)
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 108
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;


-- -----------------------------------------------------
-- Table `usersdb`.`attachments`
-- -----------------------------------------------------
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `usersdb`.`attachments` ;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `usersdb`.`attachments` (
  `idattachments` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `idemails` INT NOT NULL,
  `usernames` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,
  `filename` MEDIUMTEXT NOT NULL,
  `content` LONGBLOB NOT NULL,
  `contentType` MEDIUMTEXT NOT NULL,
  `contentDisposition` MEDIUMTEXT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`idattachments`),
  UNIQUE INDEX `idattachments_UNIQUE` (`idattachments` ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX `fk_idemails_idx` (`idemails` ASC) VISIBLE,
  INDEX `fk_usernames_idx` (`usernames` ASC) VISIBLE,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_att_usernames`
    FOREIGN KEY (`usernames`)
    REFERENCES `usersdb`.`userinfo` (`usernames`)
    ON DELETE CASCADE
    ON UPDATE CASCADE,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_idemails`
    FOREIGN KEY (`idemails`)
    REFERENCES `usersdb`.`emails` (`idemails`)
    ON DELETE CASCADE
    ON UPDATE CASCADE)
ENGINE = InnoDB
AUTO_INCREMENT = 4
DEFAULT CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4
COLLATE = utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci;
